extracted_entities.name: Associate Senior Lecturer (Tenure Track) in AI for Software Engineering

details.focus: Using and developing generative AI to improve software development processes and the quality of software artefacts.
responsibilities: Research, teaching, and supervision in software engineering
Participate in research and educational activities
Course development and student supervision at various educational levels
eligibility: Completion of a doctoral degree or equivalent scientific competence
Preference for candidates who earned their doctoral degree within the last five years
